name: Cosmic Dawn - pre alpha demo
description:
This is still just a bitesized prealpha demo!

(Massive thank you to everyone who reached out and provided feedback!!)

Update: 

- Fixed another five thousand or so bugs. Where are they all hiding? By the next update most likely the arachnid enemy will be in the game, ready to kick ass (and get ass kicked).
